notFound.title: Scrcpy could not be found
notFound.message: Please make sure if it's installed. If already installed, please configure the path in settings.

adb.notFound:
ADB not found
Please set explicit path in settings.
adb.connect:
Failed to connect to device:
{{ error }}
adb.getDeviceIp:
Failed to get device IP:
{{ error }}
adb.switchToTcpIp:
Failed to switch to network:
{{ error }}

adbNotFound.title: ADB could not be found
adbNotFound.description: Please make sure if it's installed. If already installed, please configure the path in

devices.switchedToNetwork:
Device switched successfully to network,
please disconnect the USB Cable.

disconnect.title: Disconnect device?
disconnect.message: Are you sure you want to disconnect this device?

adbExecutable.title: adb executable
adbExecutable.description:
Explicitly set adb executable path.
Set this in case the executable is not added to $PATH, or the app can't find it.

scrcpyExecutable.title: scrcpy executable
scrcpyExecutable.description:
Explicitly set scrcpy executable path.
Set this in case the executable is not added to $PATH, or the app can't find it.

size.title: Maximum size (resolution)
size.description: Limit both width and height to a maximum value, preserving aspect ratio

codec.title: Codec
codec.description:
H265 may provide better quality, but H264 should provide lower latency.
AV1 encoders are not common on older devices

modesInfoBar.title: Control modes
modesInfoBar.description: Click on the links to open scrcpy documentation:

pushTarget.title: Push target
pushTarget.description: Path on the device to push files

stayAwake.title: Stay awake
stayAwake.description:
Keep device awake while plugged in
Previous value gets restored on exit
Has no effect is the device is connected through network (Android behavior)

turnScreenOff.title: Turn screen off
turnScreenOff.description:
Turn device screen off immediately on start
Can be toggled when scrcpy is running via shortcut: MOD + O / MOD + Shift + O

showTouches.title: Show touches
showTouches.description:
Enable ‚Äúshow touches‚Äù developer option while running
Previous value gets restored on exit.

startApp.title: Start app
startApp.description:
Start given app (by package name) on start
Adding '+' prefix would force-close the app before being started
Adding '?' prefix would search for the app by name
Both prefixes can be combined in this order:'+?'
startApp.listAppsError: Could not get list of apps

noWindow.title: Disable window
noWindow.description:
Disable window completely (Headless / server mode)
Typically used for playing audio only

alwaysOnTop.title: Always on top
alwaysOnTop.description: Keep the window always on top of other windows

fullscreen.title: Fullscreen
fullscreen.description: Start scrcpy directly in fullscreen mode

windowTitle.title: Window title
windowTitle.description: Custom window title instead of device model

infoBar.title: Tip
infoBar.description: It is recommended to use virtual display with 'Start app' option available in

toggle.title: Create virtual display
toggle.description: Create and mirror a virtual display instead of the main device screen

resolution.title: Resolution
resolution.description: Explicitly set the resolution for virtual display

dpi.title: DPI
dpi.description: Explicitly set the DPI for virtual display

infoBar.title: Video source is not set to 'camera'
infoBar.description: These settings won't have an effect until the video source is set to 'camera'
infoBar.button: Click here to configure the video source

facing.title: Camera facing
facing.description: Automatically select the camera based on selected facing direction

record.title: Save to
record.description: Select where to save the recording file to (along with the file extension)

infoBar.title: Guide
infoBar.description: You need to have `v4l2loopback-dkms` installed to be able to create a V4L2 device
infoBar.moreInfo: More information available in scrcpy documentation

sink.title: Sink
sink.description: Send video stream to a V4L2 loopback device (e.g. '/dev/videoN')

deleteDialog.title: Delete profile?
deleteDialog.message:
Are you sure you want to delete this profile?
This action is irreversible, and you will lose the configured scrcpy options stored in this profile

multipleDeleteDialog.title: Delete profiles?
multipleDeleteDialog.message:
Are you sure you want to delete {count} profiles?
This action is irreversible, and you will lose the configured scrcpy options stored in these profiles
